name: AURA | Modern Living
store_story: AURA was born from a love of quiet spaces, natural materials, and designs that age gracefully. What began as a small studio workshop has grown into a curated home-living store that celebrates craftsmanship and intentional living.
ambience: Warm, modern, and calm. Think soft lighting, neutral palettes, natural woods, and curated music that makes browsing feel effortless.
description: Curated minimalist furniture and decor for the modern home. We believe in simplicity, functionality, and timeless beauty.

services.interior_design_consultation: Book a 45-minute consultation with our in-house designer to help create your perfect space.
services.gift_wrapping: Complimentary minimal-style wrapping on all gift purchases.
services.white_glove_delivery: Available for furniture orders within 50 miles. Includes assembly and placement.
services.virtual_showroom_tour: Live video walkthroughs for remote shoppers.

policies.shipping: Free shipping on orders over $500. Standard US shipping takes 3–5 business days.
policies.returns: 30-day return policy for all items in original condition. Return shipping is free.
policies.warranty: All furniture includes a 2-year manufacturer warranty.
policies.price_match: We match verified competitor pricing for identical items.

FAQs.answer: Yes, international shipping is available. Rates vary by region.
